scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development nodemon -w src/server -w src/server.ts -e .ts --exec "node -r ts-node/register src/server.ts"
scripts.start-client: NODE_ENV=development nodemon -w src/client -w src/client.ts -e .ts --exec "node -r ts-node/register src/client.ts"
scripts.start-customer-client: NODE_ENV=development nodemon -w src/customer_client -w src/customer_client.ts -e .ts --exec "node -r ts-node/register src/customer_client.ts"
